name: Don't Drop (mi-stas)
description:
Our command:

Мищенко Станислав Алексеевич (mi-stas) - programmer.

Мирзоев Эльмар Эльдарович (pengwin) - game designer, programmer.

Галеева Алина Витальевна (teckno) - artist, designer.

Hypercasual game about stickmen make you feel exitement of extrim voyage! Save all of stickmen! Don't drop them with random movements - drive the float carefully and you will be successful! Don't crash into objects and you will win!

Control - press and move
